sentences.sContent: He received a low mark for trigonometry.
sentences.sContent_eng: He received a low mark for trigonometry.

sentences.sContent: It was also programmed with subroutines for logarithms and trigonometry.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was also programmed with subroutines for logarithms and trigonometry.
sentences.sCn: 它也用编好的子程序计算对数和三角。

sentences.sContent: Listing 6 shows how to declare some EXSLT extension functions for trigonometry and dates.
sentences.sContent_eng: Listing 6 shows how to declare some EXSLT extension functions for trigonometry and dates.
sentences.sCn: 清单 6 显示了如何声明一些三角和日期 EXSLT 扩展函数。

words.tran: 三角的；三角形的；三方晶系的
（占星术12宫中隔120度的）三宫之一组；三角琴；三角形

trans.tranOther: the part of mathematics concerned with the relationship between the angles and sides of  triangles
